text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Oh, they're here!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much, grandmother. I shall see you later.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Mejiro Ramonu! Do you have some time? I would like to ask 
you a bit more about your upcoming running rotation…!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Recently, many of your opponents have been starting to 
view you as a serious threat. What are your thoughts on 
that? Fans have been talking a lot about you too…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Fufu.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Indeed. I too am looking forward to the races.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: H-huh? Ms. Ramonu…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
With that, I bid you all farewell. 
I wish to prepare for my next race.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Oh… She's gone…

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: You sure are popular.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
However, this is by no means something I wished upon myself. 
I believe you of all people should understand.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Of course. You would much rather things to be simpler.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
When people stop you in the streets, don't you think 
they come up with the most wonderful pick-lines?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
I never thought about it. Though I guess for you it'd probably 
relieve you of some of your boredom.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh, right you are. Then allow me to ask you something else.

text_block_list.name: Academy Staff A
text_block_list.text:
In a bit, we will be opening the campus to the children. 
I will be counting on you two today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so nervous. Will we really be alright?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Be confident in yourself, Dober. You have already 
prepared for a long time for this day. I can guarantee 
that you will be alright. Also…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
You are quite skilled at looking after younger children. 
Additionally, I will be supporting you the whole way, 
so let us give it our all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……! Thank you Ardan. I feel a bit more courageous now.

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Wow! It's the real Tracen Academy! It's so beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Chaperone
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much for your time today. The children 
and I have been looking forward to this day for some time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
I am honored to hear that. Today, we shall provide 
a tour of the school campus. I am Mejiro Ardan and 
this is Mejiro Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: And I am Mejiro Ramonu.

text_block_list.name: Dober & Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Ramonu!? 
Sister…!

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Um. Mejiro Ramonu? That Mejiro Ramonu!? No way, she's the real deal…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Forgive me for the abrupt change to the itinerary. Currently, our 
school is preparing next year's pamphlet by taking photographs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Today, to prepare some photos, I have come to join you 
on this tour… I am pleased to make your acquaintance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Now, for the pictures.

text_block_list.name: Camera-holding Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Of course, leave it to me, Ms. Ramonu! 
Please give me some time to take some pictures!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Wait, sorry… What should I be doing?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Calm down Dober. This is Big Sister we are talking about here. 
She must have something on her mind. For now, let us stick 
to the plan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Then, allow us to take you on a tour of the interior 
of the school facilities. Please follow us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
The gym here is used by our students for their 
own independent training. Additionally, they may 
personally rent out some of the equipment to…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(I was a bit worried at first, but it seems that everything 
is still going according to plan. At this rate, we should 
be able to finish without a problem)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Besides, having Ramonu here with us definitely 
seems to make the kids more excited)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Last but not least, I would like to begin today's final program. 
I would like to show everyone the practice race course.

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: We're allowed to run on the course?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Of course. First, we need to go over the basics, 
and afterwards, everyone may run on the track.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
It's dangerous to just go and run, so we would like to go 
over the basics of running. We'll give a demonstration, 
so watch us properly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: However, before that…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Let us show them what a race can be. 
We can do this here and now.

text_block_list.name: Child Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Ramonu and the others are going to 
run together?! I totally wanna see…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Indeed… Make sure you burn this moment into your eyes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: With that, let's race, Ardan.
